mailSubject: Re: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Hi Shubham,

Thank you for providing the internal data to update the checklist.

I have reviewed the updated checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC and noted the areas where information is missing, particularly regarding the directorship, tax documentation, regulatory compliance, and PEP screening data.

I will follow up to gather the necessary information for these items. If you have any additional insights or contacts that could assist in obtaining this data, please let me know.

Thank you again for your support.

Best regards,
Surbhi
